game.name: Dig Island
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dig Island는 4인 협동 굴착 게임입니다. 더 깊이 파고들수록 새로운 자원을 발견하고 장비를 업그레이드하며, 친구들과 함께 비행기를 수리해 섬에서 탈출하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig Island is a 4-player co-op digging game. As you dig deeper, discover new resources, upgrade your equipment, and work with your friends to repair the plane and escape the island.
